name: War of Criminals
description: The war of 3 most powerful mafia families starts. That's what happens when interests of mafia syndicates are at stake. To widen areas of influence in the city you are to fight to the last. Choose your side and help your family to rule the whole city!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
